attributes.action: reinstate the 5 prison officer who are suspended after an incident with Michael Adebolajo one of the two men who killed Drummer Lee Rigby,
attributes.additional_details:
Five prison officers have been wrongfully suspended after an incident involving one of the violent murderers of Drummer Lee Rigby, Michael Adebolajo has shown how violent he can,during the struggle Adebolajo lost some teeth.
These Prison officers must be reinstated without delay
